original_text: Some of the guards kept safe the valuable things that the priests used when they served the Lord. The guards counted those things when the priests brought them in. They counted them again when the priests took them out.
korean_text: 그 중에 어떤 자는 섬기는 데 쓰는 기구를 맡아서 그 수효대로 들여가고 수효대로 내오며

sentences.original_text: Some of the guards kept safe the valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 일부 경비병들은 귀중한 것들을 안전하게 보관했고

sentences.original_text: that the priests used when they served the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들이 주를 섬길 때 사용하던 것들이었다

sentences.original_text: when the priests brought them in
when the priests took them out
